value.title: No Fear for this Nydus | Bait ICYFAR G1
value.excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players sent in their replays where they tried to bait their opponents out of position!   NEW ICYFAR CHALLENGE: "Hit and Run" - avoid head on fights and backstab, run by and basetrade your way to victory. Send submissions to fluxiorsc@gmail.com

value.title: No Macro Mechanics? Tribute to Brood War - G1 - The PiG Daily #195
value.excerpt: In this week’s ICYFAR players had to win without using any SC2 macro mechanics.
